404.Title: It seems that you got lost!

Hero.Title: Control your health with more security
Hero.Subtitle: Get the best follow-up to manage your disease safely.

Solution.Title: A customised monitoring application
Solution.Desc1: DiabiLink takes care of the patient's lack of autonomy by offering him a monitoring tool adapted to his needs.
Solution.Desc2: Our application will connect referrers, medical staff and patients in order to provide tailor-made assistance and optimal care to offer you the best follow-up according to your needs.
Solution.Desc3: With DiabiLink, put on a safety net for living with diabetes !

Services.Title: A tool adapted to your needs
Services.InstantMessagingDesc: Communicate more easily with your contacts, via our application, so you don't lose the thread of the conversation.
Services.Follow-UpDesc: Track your or your patient's results with a single click, and get a tailored summary of their glucose levels.
Services.AlertsDesc: Receive real-time alerts of the latest events or information available, directly on your application.

FAQ.Title: Any questions ?
FAQ.Subtitle: The most common questions are answered.
FAQ.A1: We offer three types of plan. The patient plan is free, the referral plan is â‚¬4.99 per month and the medical plan is â‚¬19.99 per month.
FAQ.Q2: Are my relatives alerted to an abnormal incident ?
FAQ.A2: Your relatives receive an alert in case of an abnormal measurement in order to get help as soon as possible.
FAQ.A3: In the context of the GDPR, all the information contained on our application is protected and strictly confidential. Only those people to whom you have authorised access may consult your medical data.

SendCode.Title: Forgot your password ?
SendCode.Description: Enter the email address associated with your account and we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password

ResetPassword.Title: Reset your password
ResetPassword.Description: Enter the code received on your mailbox to change your current password

Frames.Security: Only one more step to join our big family.
Frames.Mail: This is the beginning of a great adventure between us ðŸŽ‰.

Account.Title: Choose your account type
Account.PatientDesc: allows you to save and view all your diabetes data. You can share this data with your family members or doctors who have a Patient or Medical Professional account.
Account.ReferentDesc: allows you to follow a relative who has a Patient account. You will have access to their diabetes data and will be alerted in case of abnormal measurements.
Account.MedicalProDesc: allows you to track all your patients with a Patient account. You will have access to their diabetes data and be alerted in case of abnormal measurements.
